definition: A person who is held against their will, typically in a confined space, as a result of being captured or imprisoned. This term is commonly used to refer to individuals who are deprived of their freedom due to legal or military circumstances.

examples.german: Der Gefangene flüchtete aus dem Gefängnis.
examples.english: The prisoner escaped from the prison.

examples.german: Der Gefangene wurde zum Tode verurteilt.
examples.english: The prisoner was sentenced to death.
